name: Analytical Mind
description: Provides +2 dice to tests involving logic-based analysis, including Matrix perception.

name: Codeslinger (Hacking on the Fly)
description: Provides +2 dice to a specific Matrix action, here 'Hacking on the Fly'.

name: Focused Concentration
description: Provides bonuses to sustain complex forms. If adapted, could grant stability to bonuses without penalty.

name: High Pain Tolerance
description: Reduces wound penalties, could help in Matrix combat scenarios.

name: Quick Configurator
description: Provides +1 to dice pools when reconfiguring devices on the fly.
